ai-iti7:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti7:2.1_0: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding all, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
ai-iti7:2.2_0: By directly knowing and completely understanding the all, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
ai-iti7:3.1_0: “Those who know the all as all,
ai-iti7:3.4_0: and have risen above all suffering.”
ai-iti7:4.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
